title: The Taboo Tales: Jack & Diane
description: Sometimes love can't differentiate between right and wrong... Diane was walking home minding her own business when her half-brother Jack drives by. He offers her a ride and Diane accepts. Little did Diane know that her estranged brother had sexual feelings for her. Jack kidnaps Diane to make her his in every way imaginable. Now Diane is a prisoner on Jack's farm with no hope of escape...... WARNING: This story contains graphic sex, forced seduction, rape fantasy and incest. All characters are eighteen and above. Adult content!
author: Nikita King
